article.title: Lafayette Group Snags Public Safety Communications Contract
article.author: George Seffers

tags.tag: Space and Naval Warfare Systems Center

article.text: Lafayette Group Incorporated, Vienna, Virginia, has been awarded a contract potentially valued at nearly $31 million for technical support to federal, state, and local government agencies engaged in a wide range of command, control, communications, computers and intelligence activities supporting communications interoperability for public safety.Â The Space and Naval Warfare Systems Center Pacific, San Diego, California, is the contracting activity.
